reviewText: Got this one too for fiancee he loved it also.
Got it for the fiance for Christmas.  He loved it.

I love catfishing and wanted to go deeper into the skills of the sport to increase my catch count and size. This DVD series showed some good catches and gave a few pointers but I wanted much, much more on the specifics of bait, season, time of year, location, gear, water depth/temperature, tricks and tips with less scenes of showing off big catches. It has some of what I was seeking but not nearly enough. The tips shown could have been presented in 5 minutes...the rest is a repeat of what we have all seen before. In short, it's not bad but it should be better.
